short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open every new tab in a new window.
short.it: Aprire ogni nuova scheda in una nuova finestra.
short.ja: 新しいタブを新しいウィンドウに開きます。
short.no: Åpner alle nye faner i et nytt vindu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's not perfect, but it's the best approach for disabling tabbed browsing.

When you open a new tab, that tab will automatically move into a new window.

New in Version 3.4
* Migrate to Manifest V3 (No feature change)

New in Version 3.3
* Add "Maximize" option

Help Wanted:
Translators for languages other than English, Japanese, Italian, Norwegian, Spanish.
Please contact to me <ozawa@coroq.com>
long.es:
No es perfecto, pero es la mejor manera para inhabilitar navegación en pestañas.

New in Version 3.4
* Migrate to Manifest V3 (No feature change)

New in Version 3.3
* Add "Maximize" option

Help Wanted:
Translators for languages other than English, Japanese, Italian, Norwegian, Spanish.
Please contact to me <ozawa@coroq.com>
long.it:
Non perfetto, ma è il modo migliore per disattivare la navigazione a schede.

Quando si apre una nuova scheda, quella scheda si sposta automaticamente in una nuova finestra.

Nuovo nella versione 3.4
Migrare a Manifest V3 (nessun cambiamento di funzionalità)

Nuovo nella versione 3.3
* Add "Maximize" option

Help Wanted:
Translators for languages other than English, Japanese, Italian, Norwegian, Spanish.
Please contact to me <ozawa@coroq.com>
long.ja:
タブ ブラウジングを無効にするのに近い効果を得られます。
新しいタブを開くと、そのタブは自動的に新しいウィンドウで開きます。

バージョン 3.4 での変更点
* Manifest V3 に移行（機能は変更なし）

バージョン 3.3 での変更点
* 最大化オプションを追加
long.no:
Ikke perfekt, men beste framgangsmåte for å deaktivere fanebasert nettsurfing.

New in Version 3.4
* Migrate to Manifest V3 (No feature change)

New in Version 3.3
* Add "Maximize" option

Help Wanted:
Translators for languages other than English, Japanese, Italian, Norwegian, Spanish.
Please contact to me <ozawa@coroq.com>
